name: Build and Deploy PDF Blog

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: "pages"
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '22'   # your local version is v22.11.0

      # If you later add dependencies to package.json, keep this.
      # Right now it's harmless even if you have no dependencies.
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Run build script
        env:
          SITE_URL: https://233lol.com
        run: npm run build

      # Upload the whole repo root (HTML, PDFs, CSS, etc.) as the site artifact
      - name: Upload GitHub Pages artifact
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: .  # current directory (index.html, pdfs/, style.css, etc.)

  deploy:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
